# Master Cavalier (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Champion (WotC), pg. 124

*When you utter the final words of this spell, your muscles and equilibrium shift dramatically, making you feel more at home in the saddle than you do on your own feet.*

Upon casting this spell, you gain a +10 bonus on all [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] checks. If you have *special mount* or similar class ability, your bonus on [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] checks increases to +20 while you are mounted on your special mount.

If you cast *master cavalier* along with *[[Phantom Charge (Spell)|phantom charge]]* speed equal to its normal land-based movement rate, with average maneuverability. This effect lasts until either *master cavalier* or *[[War-Mount (Spell)|war-mount]]* expires.
